extracted_playbook.title: Update DIAScreen to v1.5.0
extracted_playbook.description: Install version 1.5.0 of DIAScreen on all affected systems to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Educate Users on Social Engineering
extracted_playbook.description: Educate users to avoid clicking web links or opening attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement ICS Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets. Refer to CISA's resources for guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
